'''v0.9.4 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' released on July 17, 2014 for Android and on July 19, 2014 for iOS. It fixes some of the bugs and crashes in [[Pocket Edition v0.9.3 alpha|v0.9.3 alpha]]. For iOS devices, this version includes changes from v0.9.3.

== Changes ==

* When returning to the game after locking the device, going to the home screen or switching apps, the game opens up in the pause menu
*Zombies now have {{armor|2}} armor points, preventing 8% of [[damage]] from other mobs or the player.
